title: Democracy Women's Ab Solution Straight Leg Jean
description: Democracy’s signature “Ab”solution jean uses innovative construction that incorporates super-stretch denim
A Democracy favorite, classic straight leg. Made with soft, luxe fabrics to fit in your every day life
Pockets a strategically placed for a figure flattering shape and a sweetheart back yoke to "boost your assets"
Great for all body shapes. We recommend ordering one size down for your most "flatter"ing it.
Whiskering, fading and distressed detail varying by color
Also available in short and long inseams and Petite and Plus sizes

Built from the bottoms up, Democracy blends a universal fit for all shapes and sizes with an effortless aesthetic. Inspired by this multitasking woman with an ageless mindset, Democracy introduces emerging trends in an accessible and affordable way that meets all of her lifestyle needs. Through unparalleled value that fits her body and her wallet. Democracy embraces who she is, enhances what she’s got, elevates her confidence, and evolves her personal style.
